scenario.name: register_client
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field1] SIP/2.0 User-Agent: SLICK IMS 4.0.0 Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,CANCEL,BYE,UPDATE,INFO,REFER,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,PRACK Supported: path Expires: 1800 Authorization: Digest username="[field3]",realm="[field1]",nonce="",algorithm=MD5,uri="sip:ims.voiceblue.com",response="",qop=auth,nc=00000001,cnonce="" P-Access-Network-Info: IEEE-802.11;i-wlan-node-id=9cc7a608a31d Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;q=1.00;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel";+g.3gpp.smsip;video;+sip.instance="<urn:gsma:imei:35676506-815566-0>" From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: reg///[call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Max-Forwards: 70 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]-reg;transport=[transport];rport Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[field1] SIP/2.0 User-Agent: SLICK IMS 4.0.0 Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,CANCEL,BYE,UPDATE,INFO,REFER,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,PRACK Supported: path Expires: 1800 [field2] P-Access-Network-Info: IEEE-802.11;i-wlan-node-id=9cc7a608a31d Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;q=1.00;+g.3gpp.icsi-ref="urn%3Aurn-7%3A3gpp-service.ims.icsi.mmtel";+g.3gpp.smsip;video;+sip.instance="<urn:gsma:imei:35676506-815566-0>" From: <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: reg///[call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Max-Forwards: 70 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch]-reg;transport=[transport];rport Content-Length: 0
